amendment.description: An amendment numbered 86 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds to pay for the salary and expenses of Office of Refugee Resettlement Director Robin Dunn Marcos.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 254 (Roll no. 662).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 254 (Roll no. 662).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
